name: The Sims 3
notes:
- If Steam is stuck at installing VC Redist, remove "_install.vdf" files inside game's steam folder.
- This installer automatically adds ErrorTrap and Overwatch mods by nRaas to improve game's stability. Remove if you experience issues, but it's highly suggested to leave them.

task.description: Setting version to xp for Sims3LauncherW...
task.name: set_regedit

content:
files:
- resource: https://github.com/tannisroot/sims3-stuff/releases/download/mods/Resource.tar.xz
- overwatch: https://github.com/tannisroot/sims3-stuff/releases/download/mods/NRaas_Overwatch.tar.xz
game:
  appid: 47890
  arch: win32
  prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Creating prefix
    install_mono: false
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- execute:
    command: ln -s "$GAMEDIR/prefix" "$CACHE/prefix"
- execute:
    command: ln -s "$HOME/.local/share/lutris" "$GAMEDIR/prefix/dosdevices/g:"
- task:
    app: dotnet20
    arch: win32
    description: Installing .Net 2.0
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $CACHE/prefix
    silent: true
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Setting version to xp for Sims3LauncherW...
    key: Version
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\AppDefaults\Sims3LauncherW.exe
    prefix: $CACHE/prefix
    value: winxp
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Setting version to 7 for default...
    key: Version
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine
    prefix: $CACHE/prefix
    value: win7
- task:
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  restore_gamma: true
winesteam:
  UseXVidMode: true
  esync: true
  overrides:
    steamwebhelper.exe: disabled
  version: tkg-oldnvidia-sims3-4.1-x86_64
